ðŸ“– Summary: lyricScribe is a Go script designed to fetch, check, and display synchronized lyrics for songs played using MPRIS-compatible music players. It allows users to easily view lyrics in sync with their music, and offers configuration options, including specific support for floating lyrics on Hyprland.
